We forked the Trust Wallet for Android project to bootstrap the Aptoide Wallet development. We considered it the best alternative regarding already implemented functionalities. We forked it with the intention of contributing back with implementations and work that would be considered relevant.

AppCoins是用於應用程式經濟的加密貨幣。 您可以在多個交易所買賣它，並用它購買應用程式內商品。

Due to an unusual transaction history, your Aptoide balance was blocked. You\'ll still be able to make payments and transaction with other methods except Aptoide balance.\n\nIf you believe this is a mistake, contact us at:
There was a problem with your card. Please try with a different card or payment method.
The transaction has been rejected by your bank. Please try with a different card or payment method.
It seems you don\'t have enough funds or there\'s a limit on your card. Please try with a different card or payment method.
It seems your card is expired. Please try again with a different payment method.
Invalid card number. Please check it and try again.
Your card is not supported yet. Please try again with a different card or payment method.

Once you receive the Aptoide balance, use it to make purchases in your favorite games!
Update the Aptoide Wallet to complete this purchase.

Keeping the Aptoide Wallet updated guarantees the best experience.
Back up your wallet before updating.
在下面貼上您的錢包備份。
我們不會儲存您的私鑰或任何其他存取方式。 確保錢包的備份（密鑰庫）的安全很重要。
Your backup is ready!\nKeep it safe.
Print it and store it somewhere safe.
Copy it to a private and secure cloud storage.
確保您的資金安全，並確保隨時可以存取您的錢包。

您將在每次付款後都獲得此獎勵。

達到下個等級需消耗的數量
Spend %s more to reach the next level.
「地球是我們所有人的共同點。」 ——溫德爾‧貝瑞
「這是一個人的一小步，卻是人類的一大步。」 ——尼爾·阿姆斯壯
「我比較想死在火星上。只要不是墜毀火星就行了。」—— 伊隆．馬斯克
「每個人都是月亮，有著黑暗的一面，他從沒有向任何人展示過。」——馬克·吐溫
「一旦發現所有真相，就很容易理解；重點是要發現它們……」——伽利略·伽利萊
「如果你在歐羅巴找到生活，你會怎麼稱呼它？比如，歐洲人嗎？」——奈爾·德·葛拉司·泰森
「我最喜歡的科學理論是土星的環完全由丟失的航空行李組成。」——馬克·羅素
「我確信宇宙充滿了智慧的生命。它太聰明了，所以才無法來到這裡。」 ——亞瑟·克拉克
「天王星的衛星似乎有些扭曲。」——羅伯特·斯塔威爾·鮑爾爵士
「那顆星不在列表上！」——羅雷爾·路德威·德亞瑞司特發現了海王星
「在某個地方，令人難以置信的事情正在等待人們知道。」——卡爾·薩根
